comments:
Pulsed deuterium light source, double beam optical arrangement, grating monochromator
providing a spectral band width of 0.9 nm, measurements at steps of  0.9 nm
name: fluorodichloromethyl peroxynitrate
citation: O. Morel, R. Simonaitis, and J. Heicklen, "Ultraviolet absorption spectra of HO
